title: Profinet Interface Parameter Reader
name: LGF_ReadPnInterfaceParameter
description: Provides interface parameters such as IP Address, MAC Address, and PN Name.

input.name: hardwareId
input.description: Hardware ID of the Interface where the parameter should be read

output.name: done
output.description: Commanded functionality has been completed successfully

output.name: busy
output.description: FB is not finished, new output values can be expected

output.name: error
output.description: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: Status of the FB and error identification

status_codes.16#7000: STATUS_NO_CALL: No job being currently processed
status_codes.16#7001: STATUS_FIRST_CALL: First call after incoming new job
status_codes.16#7002: STATUS_SUBSEQUENT_CALL: Subsequent call during active processing
status_codes.16#9000: ERR_UNDEFINED_STATE: Due to an undefined state in state machine
